Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 65th overall pick, by Toronto in 2009...
Injured on 6/6/2010 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Toronto to Cincinnati on 1/31/2011 (Going to TOR: P E. Surkamp. Going to CIN: P P. Corbin)...
Injured on 7/22/2011 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/16/2012, off Wilfredo Ledezma (HOU)...
Earned first career win on 5/10/2012...
Struck out 15 batters against Chicago (N) on 6/14/2012...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/2013, off Chris Young (HOU)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Injured on 9/29/2021 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/7/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $11,000,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2022, going 5-0, 2.25...
